name: Impactua Inc.
tagline: Dedicated Agile teams for tech companies
description:
We combine commercial software experience, top talent, world-class project management, and a focus on delivery of complex web and cloud solutions for your business. Our expertise includes development of new applications for cloud and mobile as well as integration of existing enterprise applications with emerging cloud services and 24x7 management and support of cloud applications and systems.
Our services span the entire technology life cycle from requirements gathering, system planning, application development, system integration to on-going operational technology support.
We provide excellent service at moderate prices and the highest quality having vast experience on custom software development as well as developing own start-ups and software products. Our main focus is onÂ Java back-end development, Web front-end development, DevOps services, and automated testing.
